title: Doubt
content: No information is given by the university for the commencement of new session.

comments.body:
Chill bro they will mail like 5 days before.Enjoy holidays while it lasts, probably the last actual holiday of your life
. once in college it would get hectic with each passing day
Yaar I know but I am a NKR it will be difficult for me to arrange tickets 5 days before the commencement of classes.
Assume it'll start a bit after pessat second round I guess
dont mind me asking which year are you in?
